string-array.item: Nike Phantom Venom Academy FG
Nike Tiempo Legend 8 Academy MG
Nike Jr. Mercurial Superfly 7 Academy MG
PREDATOR MUTATOR 20+ FIRM GROUND CLEATS
ADIDAS X 19+ FIRM GROUND CLEATS

string-array.name: data_benefits
string-array.item:
Mesh upper with NIKESKIN overlay contours to your foot. 
 Instep ridges create spin for precise, powerful strikes.
 Plate provides traction on firm-ground pitches. 
 Asymmetrical lacing system expands the striking area. 
 Stretchy mesh covers the lower half of the laces. 
 Colour Shown: Laser Crimson/Black/Metallic Silver 
 Style: AO0566-606

For use on short-grass or artificial surfaces 
 Colour Shown: Laser Crimson/White/Black 
 Style: AT5292-606 
 Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Regular fit 
 Laceless construction 
 adidas Primeknit upper 
 Sock-fit collar 
 Firm ground soccer cleats 
 Demonskin rubber strike zone 
 Firm ground outsole 
 Imported 
 Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Active Red 
 Product code: EF1565

Sockliner for lightweight cushioning 
 Higher plate overlap on the toe for durability 
 For use on short-grass or artificial surfaces 
 Colour Shown: Blue Hero/Obsidian/White 
 Style: AT7946-414 
 Country/Region of Origin: China

Medium fit 
 Laceless construction 
 Ultralight X-Layskin upper 
 Lightweight firm ground soccer cleats 
 Ultralight Speedframe outsole 
 3D molded heel 
 Imported 
 Product color: Team Royal Blue / Cloud White / Core Black 
 Product code: EG7137

string-array.name: data_deskripsi
string-array.item: The Nike Phantom Venom Academy FG is engineered for powerful, precise strikes that win games. Ridges on the instep create spin to control the flight of the ball, while the firm-ground plate provides the traction needed to unleash at any moment.
The Nike Tiempo Legend 8 Academy MG takes the legendary touch of calfskin leather and adds a versatile multi-ground plate for traction on natural- and artificial-grass surfaces.

The Nike Phantom Venom Academy FG is engineered for powerful, precise strikes that win games. Ridges on the instep create spin to control the flight of the ball, while the firm-ground plate provides the traction needed to unleash at any moment.
Building on the forefoot plate innovation of the 6, the Nike Mercurial Superfly 7 Academy MG Boot adds a versatile multi-ground plate that provides traction on natural- and artificial-grass surfaces.

 Stretchy mesh covers the lower half of the laces.

 Style: AO0566-606 
 Country/Region of Origin: Indonesia
